word: The world is to be taken captive by Satan's deceiving representations. Where then is our security? How shall we guard against Satan's bewitching artifices? By reading the Word of God with an intensity of desire to know Him in the light of revelation which He has left on record of Himself.--Letter 253a, Nov. 18, 1903, to Dr. J. H. Kellogg, who was entertaining pantheistic concepts.
